name: Network Speed
description:
In Network Speed, you play as a flash game character who witnesses short circuits that spread throughout the Internet. He has to flee through connection cables that connect him to other networks to reach a safe area as quickly as possible. He has to follow a very precise route, but time is of the essence, especially since too much speed would overheat the cable.

The player must move as quickly as possible along an obstacle course that he must dodge. The player must also regulate his speed or else he will overheat and slow down abruptly.

Project carried out as part of an assignment on the Unity motor.
